features: Outer Material: HAIRSHEEP is a thin and soft leather with high gloss. The finest hairsheep originates from the high altitude in Ethiopia and is tanned and dyed in Naples
Lining: Wool. Our wool linings keeps the hands warm under cold and damp autumn days and gives a good insulation down to minus five degrees celsius
Elastic helps the glove to stay in place and protects against cold air
Half Piqué: The leather is overlapped on the backhand and sewn with one millimeter seam allowance. The palm has inseam which gives the glove a neat look.
